manipulators.description: Change right option to Hyper (i.e., command+control+option+shift)
[Bear] Use control+d to toggle todo state
[Bear] Use command+v to paste as plain text

rules.description: [Bear] Use control+command+down/up to move current line(s) down/up

manipulators.description: [Bear] Use control+command+down to move current line(s) down
[Bear] Use control+command+down to move current line(s) up

rules.description: Better Shifting: Parentheses on shift keys
Better Shifting: End parenthesis on shift + space
Remap keys to use Dvorak keyboard layout
